sentences.en: A dull, plain girl she was called by rigorous critics.
sentences.cn: 过分挑剔的人说她是个其貌不扬,性格沉闷的姑娘.

sentences.en: A rigorous and comprehensive approach requires some preparatory work.
sentences.cn: 应用严格的、综合的方法需要作某些准备工作.

sentences.en: After the dawn of rigorous mathematics with him, most mathematicians followed his dictates.
sentences.cn: 在他建立严密数学之后, 多数数学家遵循他的意见.

sentences.en: Engineering departments follow - or should follow - rigorous engineering Methods : That ensure the feasibility and quality of the technology.
sentences.cn: 工程部门遵从,或者说应该遵从严格的工程方法,从而确保工程的可行性和产品的质量.

sentences.en: He is a very rigorous man, very persnickety.
sentences.cn: 他是个很严厉的人，非常挑剔。

sentences.en: He is rigorous in his control of expenditure.
sentences.cn: 他对支出控制得非常严格。

sentences.en: She had been brought up in rigorous economy.
sentences.cn: 她从小就是在非常俭朴的环境中长大的.

sentences.en: Taxis must conform to the rigorous standards laid down by the police.
sentences.cn: 出租车必须遵守警方的严格规定。

sentences.en: The more rigorous the thinning, the greater the possible genetic gain.
sentences.cn: 疏伐越是严格, 就越可能有较大的遗传增益.

sentences.en: The planes have to undergo rigorous safety checks.
sentences.cn: 飞机必须经过严密的安全检查.

sentences.en: the rigorous standards required by the college
The selection process is based on rigorous tests of competence and experience.
sentences.cn: 选拔过程是基于对能力和经验的严格测试。

sentences.en: The ship is still in rigorous quarantine.
sentences.cn: 该船仍在接受严格的隔离检疫.

sentences.en: The soldiers were not yet seasoned to the rigorous climate.
sentences.cn: 士兵们尚未能适应此种严寒的气候.

sentences.en: The work failed to meet their rigorous standards.
sentences.cn: 工作没有达到他们的严格标准。

sentences.en: They worked under rigorous conditions and the closest supervision.
sentences.cn: 他们的工作条件苛刻而且要受最严密的监视.

sentences.en: Vigorous youth is subjected to rigorous discipline.
sentences.cn: 活泼的年轻人须受到严格的纪律约束.
